sense.def:
O dogodku rečemo, da je
an affair
kadar o njem govorimo na splošno.

seg.quote: The wedding was a quiet affair.

sense.def:
One's affairs
so človekove zasebne in osebne stvari.

seg.quote: What had induced her to meddle in his affairs?

sense.def:
Če nekomu rečemo, da je nekaj
their own affair
hočemo povedati, da o tistem nočemo nič vedeti ali se nočemo vpletati v njegovo dejavnost.

cit.quote: ni moja stvar, meni nič mar

seg.quote: What went on behind that door was your own affair.

sense.def:
Če dva človeka, ki nista poročena,
are having an affair
imata spolne odnose.
